<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hive Mother](/Monsters.aspx?ID=24)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ankhrav hive mothers are fearsome predators that one can easily distinguish from the typical ankhrav not only by their greater size, but the presence of a large pair of razor-sharp, mantis-like arms.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Hive Mother](/Monsters.aspx?ID=24)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 22</row>

**Perception** +16; darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 90 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 120

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +20 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 2d6 acid

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
acid spit +17 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 5d6 acid

**Armor-Rending Bite** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The hive mother makes a mandibles Strike; if the Strike hits, the target’s armor takes the damage and the acid damage bypasses the armor’s Hardness.

**Frenzy Pheromone** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The hive mother unleashes a pheromone that causes all other ankhravs within a 100-foot emanation to become quickened 1 until the start of the hive mother’s next turn, and they can use the extra action only for Burrow, Stride, or Strike actions. The hive mother can’t unleash the pheromone again for 1d4 rounds.

**Spray Acid** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)) The hive mother spews acid in a 60-foot cone, dealing 8d6 acid damage and 1d6 persistent acid damage (DC 26 basic Reflex save). It can’t spew acid again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
